July was the hottest month on record

Secretary of State Anthony blinken is

today on famine and conflict and
Pierre's Michelle Kellerman reports he's

secretary blinken is not seeking to turn
this security council meeting into a

and its recent decision to withdraw from
a deal that allowed Ukraine to export
food through the Black Sea blinken will
be asking countries to sign on to a
communique that condemns the use of food
as a weapon of War U.S officials say
